data.title: A Collection of Promotional Literature for 23 Charlie Chan Films
data.meta_description: A mixed collection of original, contemporary British and American studio or distributor publications, mostly campaign books or pressbooks ; some with Sidney Toler and some with Warner Oland. Some folds and wear, but generally in very good condition, those with damage mostly with portions clipped out are noted; most are folio-sized and all are as issued in wrappers; as follow in no particular order: Charlie Chan at Monte Carlo U.S., Starring Oland ; Charlie Chan
data.text:
A mixed collection of original, contemporary British and American studio or distributor publications, mostly campaign books (or pressbooks); some with Sidney Toler and some with Warner Oland. Some folds and wear, but generally in very good condition, those with damage (mostly with portions clipped out) are noted; most are folio-sized and all are as issued in wrappers; as follow in no particular order: Charlie Chan at Monte Carlo (U.S., Starring Oland); Charlie Chan at Treasure Island (Toler, U.S.); another (U.K.); Charlie Chan in Panama (Toler, U.S.); a different one (U.S.); another (U.K.); Charlie Chan in Egypt (Oland, U.K., damaged); another (U.S.) and another (U.K.); Charlie Chan in Honolulu (Toler, U.S.); two others (U.K.); Charlie Chan in London (Oland. U.S.); another (U.K.); Charlie Chan in Reno (two publications; Toler, U.K.); another (U.S.); Charlie Chan in Paris (Oland, U.S. library stamp); Charlie Chan at the Wax Museum (Toler, U.S.); another (U.K.); Charlie Chan’s Chance (Toler, U.K.); Charlie Chan’s Greatest Case (Oland, U.S.); Charlie Chan at the Race Track (Oland, U.K.); another (U.S.); Charlie Chan’s Courage (Oland, U.S. - library duplicate, with a small stamp); another (U.K.) and another (U.K.); Charlie Chan at the Opera (Oland, U.K.); another (U.S., small library duplicate stamps); Charlie Chan on Broadway (Oland, U.K.); another (U.S.); Charlie Chan at the Olympics (Oland, U.K.); another (U.S.); Charlie Chan Carries On (Oland, U.K.); Charlie Chan’s Greatest Case (Oland, U.K.); Charlie Chan at the Circus (Oland, U.K.); Charlie Chan in Shanghai (Oland, U.S.); another (U.K., damaged) Charlie Chan’s Murder Cruise (Toler, U.S.); Charlie Chan’s Secret (Oland, U.S., damaged); Charlie Chan in Reno (Toler, U.S., small library stamp); in addition, there are a few odd pages from other pressbooks. All of those described above as “another” are variants, not duplicates.

[Book #23997P]
